name: ルカ
text:
アゴ、もっと引いてみなよ
練習生
trans: Pull your chin back, trainee.

name: 凛世
text:
『今日は、初めての巡回を行いました。
拍子木を手に、火の用心と唱えながら町内を歩きます。』
trans:
"Today, we departed on our first patrol.
With hyoshigi at hand, we walked around the
neighborhood, chanting to watch out for fires."

name: 凛世
text:
『メンバーは、事務所の４人と町内会、消防団のみなさま。
しっかりと注意喚起できるよう努め』────
trans:
"The members were, the four from our office and 
those from the neighborhood association and fire 
department. We strove to make our reminder heard."

name: 一同
trans: Watch out for fires────

name: 凛世
trans: A single match, can start a blaze────

name: 咲耶
text: ────小糸に避けられているように感じる……？
trans: ────You feel that Koito is avoiding you... ?

name: 凛世
text:
その……
そのように考えるのも……おこがましいのですが……
trans:
Well...
It may be presumptous... to assume that, but...

name: 凛世
text:
何か……
凛世が……ご迷惑を……
trans:
Perhaps...
Rinze has... troubled her somehow...

name: 咲耶
trans:
...... 
Do you have anything in mind...

name: 凛世
text:
…………日誌を……
勝手に……書いてしまいました……
trans:
... Writing the journal entry...
without... consulting her...

name: 小糸
trans: Watch out for fires────

name: 高校生２
text:
何系の人ー？
ともだち？
trans:
Who're you meeting with?
A friend?

name: 凛世
trans: Yes...

name: 小糸
text:
あ、あの……
それじゃ、練習が……あ、あるので…………！
trans:
Uh, ummm... 
Well then, I... I've g-got practice... !

name: 咲耶
text:
…………
『今日は実地での活動を行った。』────
trans:
...... 
"We carried out our activities on location today."────

name: 咲耶＆透
trans: Watch out for fires...

name: 咲耶
trans: ────Excuse me, it seems that I dropped something.

name: 透
trans:
...... 
A postcard?

name: 咲耶
text:
うん……
本に挟まっていたんだね────
trans:
Yes... 
It was hidden in the pages of this book────

name: 咲耶
trans: ────A Christmas card?

name: カードの文面
text:
『おばば
メリークリスマス。』
trans:
"Gramma,
Merry Christmas."

name: カードの文面
text:
『これは来年の分。
自分で渡せたらいいな。』
trans:
"This is for next year.
I wish I could give it to you in person."

name: カードの文面
trans: "Please be happy."

name: 透
trans:
... What does it mean?
────Ah, the address...

name: 咲耶
text:
近いね
……火の用心の区域だ
trans:
It's close by.
... It's within the area of our fire safety patrol.

name: 消防団の方
trans: Waaatch out... for fiiires... !!

name: 町内会の方
text:
あははっ
みんな、おっちゃんの声には敵わないねぇ？
trans:
Ahahah!
You're no match for those old guys' voices, are you?

name: 凛世
trans:
...... !
Ah, umm... I mean...

name: 消防団の方
text:
なァにそんな、アンタらが喉つぶしちゃったら
取り返しつかねェからなァ……！
trans:
What's with those calls? If you lot've ruined your
throats, there's no coming back, ya got that... !

name: 小糸
trans: Pye...

name: 消防団の方
text:
あぁごめんごめん！　いいのいいの……！
おっちゃんらがみんなのぶんの声出す約束なんだから
trans:
Aaah, sorry, sorry! It's alright... !
Us geezers will make enough noise for all of you,
promise.

name: 町内会の方
text:
そうそう。いい顔してしっかり拍子木打ってくれたらいいの
火の用心、楽しんでくれたら。ねぇ？
trans:
That's right. Just stand up straight and ring that
hyoshigi well. Try to enjoy the fire safety patrol,
alright?

name: 咲耶
text:
……ありがとうございます
楽しませていただいていますよ
trans:
... Thank you very much.
We are enjoying it quite a lot.

name: 凛世
trans: Yes... !

name: 透＆小糸
trans: Y-Yes...

name: 咲耶
trans: ────Watch out for fires... !

name: 一同
trans: ────A single match, can start a blaze... !

name: 透
trans:
Nhgaah... 
────"It was tough."... there.

name: 凛世
trans: ────Umm... about the other day...

name: 凛世
text:
勝手に……日誌を…………
申し訳ございません……
trans:
Please forgive me for... 
writing the journal entry... without asking...

name: 凛世
text:
いえ……それで……
お気を悪くされる方だとは────
trans:
No... I do not think...
she is such a person to be slighted by that────

name: 咲耶
text:
……うん
わかるつもりだよ
trans:
..... Yes.
I think I understand what you mean.

name: 凛世
text:
ただ……
それならば……どうして…………
trans:
But...
if that is so... then why...

name: 小糸
trans: Eh... Ah...

name: 咲耶
text:
……凛世が、そんなふうに誰かを困らせるなんて
私には思いもよらない
trans:
... Rinze, I can't even imagine that you could
cause trouble for anyone like that.

name: 咲耶
text:
けれど……
誰がどんなことで困ったり、何かを疎んじたりするのか
trans:
However...
The things that could trouble someone, and the
things they may despise...

name: 咲耶
text:
それもまた、他の誰かからは思いもよらない形を
持つものなのかもしれない
trans:
Those too, could be completely unimaginable
through another person's eyes.

name: 小糸
trans: W-Why....

name: 咲耶
text:
凛世に、もし間違ったと感じるところがあるなら
そのことを謝ってみるのはどうだろう
trans:
If you feel that perhaps you've done something 
wrong, maybe you could try apologizing for it.

name: 咲耶
text: そうじゃないとすれば……
trans: And if that isn't the case...

name: 咲耶
text: ……少し、時間が必要なのかもしれないな
trans: ... Perhaps, we may need more time.

name: 小糸
trans: W-Why... are you apologizing... ?

name: 小糸
text:
ぴぇ……！
す、すみません……
trans:
Pyeh... !
I, I'm sorry...

name: 透
trans:
────Nhgaah... 
"It was all kinds of tough"... full stop────

name: 透
trans: ───Huh?

name: 灯織
trans:
────! Um...
Ikaruga-san...

name: ルカ
text:
アンタ、手で踊ろうとしてるんだ
だから手に体が引っ張られる
trans:
You're trying to dance with your hands.
That's why they're pulling your body along.

name: 灯織
text:
おっしゃる通りです
そこを……直そうとしていて────
trans:
It is just as you say.
That's the part... I am trying to fix────

name: 透
trans:
Huh, time to go back?
Already.

name: 咲耶
trans: ────No, that's...

name: 透
trans: Eh, so we going back?

name: 咲耶
trans: ... Fufu.

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、そうしようか
日報ができていればだけれど────
trans:
Yeah, let's do that.
If the reports are finished, that is────

name: 小糸
text:
そ、それで大丈夫……です……
…………出してくる……ね
trans:
T-That's... alright...
... I'll go and... submit them.

name: 咲耶
text: 私たちは軽く戸締りをしてこよう
trans: Let's go around and lock up some of the doors.

name: 透
trans: Suuure.

name: ルカ
text:
アゴ引くだけ。手は見ない
────ほら
trans:
Just pull your chin. Don't look at your hands.
────See?

name: 灯織
trans: Yes...!

name: ルカ
text:
アハハッ、いいね……！
それでオーディションひとつふたつはブチ抜ける！
trans:
Ahaha, nice...!
That's gonna help you win an audition or two!

name: 灯織
trans:
Y-Yes...
...Amazing────

name: ルカ
text:
じゃアンタ、もう休んどけよ
ずっとここいんだろ
trans:
You should get some rest, then,
since you've been here all day.

name: 灯織
trans:
......！
Um, thank you for noticing.

name: 灯織
text:
……でも、せっかくご指導いただいたので
今の感じを体に覚えこませたくて────
trans: ...But, you've instructed me so well, I want my body to remember what it feels like now────

name: 灯織
text:
すみません、
もう一度だけ見ていていただけないでしょうか
trans: If you don't mind, can you please watch me one more time?

name: ルカ
text:
いいよ
一回で済むのか知らねぇけど────
trans:
Sure.
You'd need that more than once, though────

name: 透
trans:
... Ah.
Hey.

name: 透
text: クリスマスカードって
trans: The Christmas card.

name: 咲耶
text:
どうしようか
私も、ずっと考えていたのだけれど
trans:
What should we do?
I've been thinking about it this whole time, but...

name: 咲耶
text:
図書館で古いクリスマスカードを見つけてね
……本に挟まっていたんだ
trans:
See, we found an old Christmas card at the library.
... It was stuck in the pages of a book.

name: 小糸
trans: A Christmas card...

name: 咲耶
text:
差出人はわからない
けれど、宛先ははっきり書かれていた
trans:
We don't know who the sender was.
But, the delivery address is written clearly.

name: 透
text:
ここの近く
めっちゃ
trans:
It's close to here.
Like, really.

name: 小糸
trans:
..... Huh?
S-So... do you have it... !?

name: 透
text:
え？　あー
ううん
trans:
Eh? Ahh.
Nope.

name: 咲耶
text:
……そのままにしてあるよ
ちょっと不思議なメッセージが書かれていて……
trans:
... We left it where we found it.
The message written there was a little strange...

name: 咲耶
text: 何か、あそこに挟んでおく意味があるのかもしれない
trans: Perhaps, there was some reason it was left in there.

name: 凛世＆小糸
trans: ────W-What was written there... ?

name: 凛世＆小糸
trans: Pyeeh.. !

name: 咲耶
trans: Fufu, would you like to know?

name: 小糸
trans: Ah... ehh...

name: 咲耶
text: ……少し、時間が必要なのかもしれないな
trans: ... Perhaps, we may need more time.

name: 咲耶
text:
……そうだね、ふたりにも見てもらえたら
いい解決策が浮かびそうだ
trans:
...Yes, perhaps if the two of you took a look,
we might figure out a good plan of action.

name: 透
trans: Eh? Ahh...

name: 透
trans: Yes.

name: 咲耶
text: 明日、事務所に寄る予定は？
trans:
Do you have any plans to come by the office 
tomorrow?

name: ルカ
trans: Hah...!

name: ルカ
text:
────誰のクラス受けてんのか知らねぇけど
次行ったらぶっとぶよ
trans:
──── I don't know whose class you're taking,
but they're gonna be shocked the next time you're there.

name: 灯織
trans: ──I can only hope so...!

name: マネージャー
trans:
Luca...?
Luca, are you there──────

name: 灯織
text:
もっと本格的なダンスも観たりして
今学ばせてもらってることを、深めたいなと思ったり……
trans: I want to watch more serious dancing, and deepen what I'm learning now...

name: ルカ
trans: Heh?

name: 灯織
text:
────あっ、私の話なんて……！
今日は貴重なお時間をいただいて、ありがとうございました
trans:
──── Oh, I'm starting to ramble...!
Thank you so much for your valuable time today.

name: 灯織
text:
開けてない水があるんですけど、よかったら……
──あ、すみません。飲まれないかもしれないですよね……
trans:
I have some water I haven't opened, if you'd like...
──Oh, I'm sorry. You don't have to drink it...

name: ルカ
text: あァ、横入りしねぇで買った水？
trans: Oh, the water you bought without cutting in line?

name: マネージャー
trans: ──────Huh, isn't that 283Pro's....

name: ルカ
text:
飲む
それ、いい水だから
trans:
I'll drink.
Cuz it's good water.

name: 灯織＆ルカ
trans: Ahahah...

name: ルカ
trans: ────Water of honesty, it is.
